document.full_text: rights envoy robert king became the first u.s. official to visit secretive north korea in 17 months on tuesday, as washington considers whether to resume food aid and as momentum builds to resume nuclear disarmament talks.
document.title: u.s. rights envoy makes groundbreaking trip to north korea
lines_and_colors: rights envoy robert king became the first u.s. official to visit secretive north korea in 17 months on tuesday, as washington considers whether to resume food aid and as momentum builds to resume nuclear disarmament talks.
